bibl.title: The EES Delta Survey: Minufiyeh 2005.
bibl.note: Minufiyeh Archaeological Survey (part of the Egypt Exploration Society's Delta Survey), 2005. - Survey in the central Delta province of Minufiyeh. The dates of surface finds range from the New Kingdom to the Late Antic and the Islamic Periods.
bibl.seg: ROWLAND Joanne and Nils BILLING, The EES Delta Survey: Minufiyeh 2005.
Egyptian Archaeology 28 (2006) pp. 3-6, 10 figg. coul., 2 cartes.

Minufiyeh Archaeological Survey (part of the Egypt Exploration Society's Delta Survey), 2005. - Survey in the central Delta province of Minufiyeh. The dates of surface finds range from the New Kingdom to the Late Antic and the Islamic Periods.
